name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and long battery life.

name: Smartwatch
description: Stylish smartwatch with health tracking features, GPS, and customizable watch faces.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, water resistance, and 10-hour battery life.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic laptop stand with adjustable height and cooling fan for better airflow.

name: 4K Monitor
description: Ultra HD 4K monitor with stunning clarity, vibrant colors, and multiple connectivity options.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Tactile mechanical keyboard with RGB lighting and customizable keycaps.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Precision gaming mouse with adjustable DPI, programmable buttons, and RGB lighting.

name: External Hard Drive
description: Portable external hard drive with 2TB storage capacity and USB 3.0 connectivity.

name: Smartphone Gimbal
description: 3-axis smartphone gimbal for smooth video recording with advanced stabilization features.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.
